title: Designing Infographic Assessments to Enhance Visual Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and foundational knowledge in scientific disciplines
context.additional_context: Non-degree science courses conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment with a formative assessment-centered modular evaluation framework

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze given scientific data to derive information structures.
Learners can transform scientific information into visual elements using infographic creation tools in a mobile environment.
Learners can critically analyze peers' infographic works based on modular evaluation criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
